text:
Sameer Shah 
Karachi, Pakistan | +923408732938 |  sameershahh.05@gmail.com | Portfolio 
 
SUMMARY 
 
Developer specializing in Python, Deep Learning, and modern web technologies. I build intelligent, data-powered 
applications that turn ideas into production-ready solutions. 
PROJECTS 
 
 
Facial Expression Recognition (FER-2013) - GitHub​
 
(PyTorch, CNN, Flask) 
●​
Built a CNN-based classifier achieving 72% test accuracy on the FER-2013 dataset. 
●​
Preprocessed 35k+ facial images with augmentation to improve generalization. 
●​
Deployed via Flask with ~200ms real-time prediction latency. 
 
Amazon Price Tracker  - GitHub 
 (Python, NextJS, Selenium, PostgreSQL, FastAPI)​
 
●​
Built a full-stack Amazon Price Tracker, integrating automation and scraping. 
●​
Developed a FastAPI backend us

ing Selenium (headless Chrome) to extract product data and store 
results in PostgreSQL dynamically. 
●​
Designed a Next.js frontend for displaying tracked products, price history, and alerts in an intuitive 
dashboard. 
 
YouTube Gesture Controller - GitHub​
 
(Python, OpenCV, MediaPipe, PyAutoGUI) 
●​
Created a real-time hand gesture recognition system for controlling YouTube playback. 
●​
Integrated MediaPipe’s Hand Landmark detection with PyAutoGUI for smooth interaction. 
 
RAG Chatbot  - GitHub​
 
(Python, FAISS, Transformers, LangChain) 
●​
Developed a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) chatbot capable of providing context-aware 
responses from custom text data. 
●​
Implemented  FAISS-based vector retrieval and transformer-based response generation. 
●​
Demonstrated strong underst

anding of vector databases, embeddings, and NLP pipelines through this 
class-level project. 
SKILLS  
 
●​
Programming: Python, JavaScript (basic) 
●​
ML/DL: scikit-learn, PyTorch, NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib 
●​
Web/Data: Django, Next.js (basic), FastAPI, BeautifulSoup, Selenium, Requests 
●​
MLOps/Cloud: AWS (EC2, S3), Vercel, Streamlit 
●​
Databases: MySQL 
●​
Frontend: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap

Spectronix​
                  Karachi, Pakistan
